channel.title: Can i change the max lvl of a skill? and can i also change the max cbt lvl?

item.title: Can i change the max lvl of a skill? and can i also change the max cbt lvl?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Yes and for your combat you calculate and switch the codes in server.java. They shouldn’t be too hard to find.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i change the max lvl of a skill? and can i also change the max cbt lvl?

item.title: Can i change the max lvl of a skill? and can i also change the max cbt lvl?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

yes…In your client.java search for

return (MAX LEVEL) (replace (MAX LEVEL) with your max stat…without the parenthases excuse my spelling
you should see

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= MAX LEVEL); lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return (MAX LEVEL); }
replace the (MAX LEVEL) with what you want the new max level too be

Read full topic
